ref: 3259 kuṇi ʻ defective in having a bent or withered arm or a hand without fingers ʼ MBh., kūṇi -- lex. [The meaning of RV. kúṇāru -- as ʻ having a withered arm ʼ is doubtful, but cf. Pk. kuṁṭa -- ~ kuṁṭāra -- s.v. *kuṇṭa -- . -- See kōṇa -- ]
Pa. kuṇi -- ʻ deformed or paralysed (of arms) ʼ, kuṇa<-> ʻ bent, lame ʼ;
Pk. kuṇi -- , ˚ṇia -- ʻ maimed of arm ʼ;
M. kuṇī n. ʻ hollow or light grain of pulse ʼ; --
B. kūṇi ʻ having a withered arm ʼ prob. ←
